about_the_game:
Get the Game Choice & Achievement Guide with detailed instructions on gameplay and achievements to complete your bundle for The Symbiant!

What you get:


- 4 paths with choices listed for 2 Good and 2 Bad Endings
- Explanation of how to get each of the 54 Steam Achievements
- All in an 13 page PDF

Thank you for supporting the dev! <3

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Intel Core2 Duo, AMD Phenom II or better
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 750
  • Storage: 10 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6+
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
